text: Is there a place where we can get updates on new releases / versions of the various APIs?  Im sure there is one somewhere but would be great if someoen can link me?

Hi all, we use webhooks and import functionality, Iâ€™ve noticed that when loading large data (more than 1k records) webhook only triggers for ~200 property changes and then stops. Can we rely on the webhook functionality to catch updated properties after import?
Hey <@U04HSBLHAJZ> I think you can subscribe here <https://developers.HubSpot.com/changelog/tag/api>
